description.value: Garlic Scapes are an herb with a stronger garlicky flavor than common chives. They are primarily used for pickling or seeding and are rarely used in cooking or as a stir-fry base for scrambled eggs. In some regions, garlic scapes are considered a seasonal delicacy, eagerly awaited each spring. Local markets fill with bundles of these curly green stalks, signaling the start of warmer months and inspiring cooks to add a unique twist to traditional recipes.
